block.p: BUILDING ONE SERVICES CORP., Washington, D.C., a building-management services company, acquired Boxberger Inc. and R. J. Miguel Inc., both janitorial companies, and plans to buy seven more for an undisclosed amount of stock and cash to expand its facilities-maintenance business.
HOUSTON INDUSTRIES, Houston, a power supplier, is planning to build a $263 million power plant in Casa Grande, Ariz.
QUAKER OATS CO., Chicago, sold its Nile Spice Soup and Meal Cup to Hain Food Group Inc., Uniondale, N.Y., for an undisclosed price.
